I've added a linegraph to an existing multichartplotter with an existing linegraph.  My intent is to have this additional linegraph show only markers (i.e., no lines) and be displayed at the top of the chart regardless of where the user pans or zooms.  To do this I specify an x/ymapping for the data series; for the x value I use real data but for Y data I want to always display my marker at the top of the chart; what is the Y value I want to specify for my SetYMapping?  I thought I had it nailed but if I resize the chart window, eventually when the chart window gets big enough I wind up in a loop where the mapping causes the viewport to resize and the viewport resize causes a new point.

 

Thanks for any help.
